Ivory Tower Wizard Carsus:
My name is Carsus, I'm a member of the Ivory Tower Investigator Guild. We've completed the investigation of the Tower's higher part and are now occupied with the lower floors.
We've set up an elevator to begin our research with the 3rd floor of the dungeon which is considered to be the least dangerous. If you need any help moving around, I will gladly help you. All you need to do is tell me which floor you would like to go to.
However, I can't teleport you to the 1st floor of the dungeon because the raid boss controlling all creatures of Cruma Tower lives there. To go to the 1st floor, talk to Ivory Tower Wizard Ian on the 2nd floor.
